original_title: Indie & Beyond with Shaun Ryder and Alan McGee
overview: Happy Mondays frontman Shaun Ryder and Creation Records boss Alan McGee reveal a selection of their all-time favourite tracks. Theirs is a blistering playlist of indie, punk and ska classics from Buzzcocks to The Specials, Junior Murvin to Marc Bolan, Orange Juice to Underworld and many more.
title: Indie & Beyond with Shaun Ryder and Alan McGee
